spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant door and window placement errors. The entrance to the house is missing, replaced by a closed wall. Interior doors are largely missing. Window in the bedroom is non-existent where it should be on the bottom wall. The dining room features a hallucinated large open void/window on the left wall not present in the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: The stairs are incorrectly oriented (perpendicular to original) and placed outside the main envelope. The Wash Area and Toilet adjacency is merged into a single ambiguous space. The wall separating the Kitchen and Living room is elongated incorrectly.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinets and stove are placed on the rear wall instead of the right/top walls. Dining table orientation is correct, but kitchen layout is structurally mirrored/rotated.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is soft and professional. Geometry is clean despite the architectural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Missing main entrance door and interior bedroom door.
Staircase orientation is rotated 90 degrees and starts from the exterior.
Kitchen appliances moved from right-side wall to back wall.
Hallucinated large window opening in the dining room left wall.
Toilet/Wash area merged and proportions distorted compared to the longitudinal plan layout.
